content.question: The researchers discovered that both species of garter snakes feed almost exclusively on amphibians found in or near the pond. Based on the results of the investigation, which of the following is most likely to occur if the amphibians become a limited source of food?

choices.label: Individuals of T. atratus will no longer prefer to be near the water.
T. sirtalis will shift its food preference to herbivory.
The reproduction rate of T. sirtalis will increase.
The population size of T. atratus will decrease.

content.answer: The population size of T. atratus will decrease.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
